name: Agents of C
description:
A short game made for the LibGDX Christmas Jam 2022.
Theme : Dystopian Christmas

As an Agent of C, you've been selected to join the ranks of those who seek to rewrite history. 

You don't know why you were chosen, but it's time to discover your role in the plan to rewrite the past and shape a new future.


Music :

"Bleeping Demo" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
